biography_text: BERGMAN, John, a Representative from Michigan; born in Shakopee, Scott County, Minn., February 2, 1947; B.A., Gustuvus Adolphus College, St. Peter, Minn., 1969; M.A., University of West Florida, Pensacola, Fla., 1975; United States Marine Corps, 1969-2009; commercial pilot; business owner; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2017-present).
